ing: 1/4 cup sliced strawberries, or to taste
des: "I love to have this while camping as all the ingredients are so self contained: banana, small tub of yogurt, small bag of muesli, scroggin, or trail mix. Use any fresh fruit you like."
ins: Place banana in a serving bowl; spoon yogurt over the top. Sprinkle muesli over yogurt. Garnish with strawberries and blueberries.
